string-array.name: general_app_tutorial
string-array.item:
Search your
favourite artiste
by User ID or
Name

Here is where
all the hottest
and most
popular artistes
perform online.
Check out the up\nand coming new\nstars of Witkey

Make a date with
all the female
artistes housed
under this
section.
Find the hottest\nmale artistes in\nWitkey here.

Explore and
participate in
Witkey's monthly
leaderboard events to
win rewards and
achievement badges!
Click on any artiste\nyou fancy to view\ntheir live broadcast!

See the Top 50
spenders,
broadcasters and
fans on our
Witkey Billboard.
Back to our home\npage on the Hottest\nArtiste.

Follow and be in
the forefront of
the latest news
and happenings
on Witkey.

Exclusive for Artiste
Broadcasters to
perform 'live' on cam
before their fans and
supporters as well as
to access their
summary reports.
Check any mails\nin your Inbox.
View your Profile\ndetails and stats here.

string-array.name: go_live_app_tutorial
string-array.item:
Broadcaster's profile,
name, rank and
number of tornados
to show popularity rating.
Shows the real-time\nearnings of broadcaster\'s\nWitkey Dollars to date
Save to follow this\nBroadcaster as a\nfan for future.
Slide to see current\nnumber of live viewers\non this broadcast.

View current ranking
position of broadcaster
in this leaderboard
game event.
Daily Task\nLeaderboard to\nearn daily rewards!

You can view the
live streaming of all
messages from
fans to the
broadcaster.
Tap to live stream\nyour messages to\nthe broadcaster.
Screenshot this live\nbroadcast to your\ngallery or posts.
Share this live\nbroadcast with\nyour friends.

Check any mails
from the
broadcaster or
Witkey's admin
 support.
Check whether you have\nwon or earned any\nrewards in yout Gift Box.

Send gifts to the
broadcaster from a wide
range of animated gifts
in the Gift Galore!
